quote: You would think as you get older your mind would fill up with what they call the spiritual side of things, but mine just seems to get more and more practical, trying to get something settled.
quote_letters: YOU WOULD THINK AS YOU GET OLDER YOUR MIND WOULD FILL UP WITH WHAT THEY CALL THE SPIRITUAL SIDE OF THINGS BUT MINE JUST SEEMS TO GET MORE AND MORE PRACTICAL TRYING TO GET SOMETHING SETTLED
